member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST_SOURCE
member.summary: The WCM_CONNECTION_COST_SOURCE enumerated type specifies the source that provides connection cost information.

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST_SOURCE.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_SOURCE_GP
member.summary: The source for the connection cost is Group Policy.

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST_SOURCE.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_SOURCE_USER
member.summary: The source for the connection cost is the user.

member.name: WCM_CONNECTION_COST_SOURCE.WCM_CONNECTION_COST_SOURCE_OPERATOR
member.summary: The source for the connection cost is the operator.
